frame.name: Being_active
frame.definition:
<def-root>An <fen>Agent</fen> is described as pursuing an <fen>Activity</fen>, expending some effort. The <fen>Agent</fen> may be active in a particular <fen>Role</fen>. Alternatively, the <fen>Activity</fen> itself may be described as having an <fen>Agent</fen> who is expending effort. In some cases, the Activity may involve a <fen>Salient_entity</fen> which may stand in for it.
<ex><fex name="Agent">Sky, a Korean War veteran,</fex> <m>was</m> <t>active</t> <fex name="Activity">in his opposition to Vietnam</fex> and continues to protest current combat in Iraq.</ex>
<ex><fex name="Agent">She</fex> <m>is</m> <t>active</t> <fex name="Place">in the community</fex> <fex name="Activity">by establishing parent groups, life skills program, sharing circles and various Aboriginal cultural activities for young women.</fex>.</ex>
<ex><fex name="Agent">John Colville</fex> <m>was</m> quite <t>active</t> <fex name="Role">as a land speculator</fex> <fex name="Place">in both Virginia and Maryland</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Duration
FE.definition:
<def-root>This FE identifies the amount of <fen>Time</fen> for which an <fen>Activity</fen> is ongoing.
<ex>Upon his release from federal detention in 1947 he joined the IWW and has remained <t>active</t> <fex name="Dur">for five decades</fex> as a graphic artist, poet, and advisor.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Activity
FE.definition:
<def-root>This FE identifies the name of the ongoing <fen>Activity</fen> in which an <fen>Agent</fen> engages.
<ex>He is always <t>active</t> <fex name="Activity">demolishing the painted figures of men's faith</fex> and then is astonished to find the faith still there clothed in new figure.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Place
FE.definition:
<def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Place</fen> where the <fen>Activity</fen> is pursued.
<ex>He is retired from Whirlpool Corp. in Clyde and is <t>active</t> <fex name="Place">at the YMCA</fex>. </ex></def-root>

FE.name: Purpose
FE.definition:
<def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Purpose</fen> for which an <fen>Agent</fen> is engaged in an ongoing <fen>Activity</fen>.
<ex>Throughout her life, Bertha was <t>active</t> in civic organizations <fex name="pur">in order to establish chiropractics in the public eye</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Time
FE.definition:
<def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Time</fen> when the <fen>Activity</fen> is pursued.
<ex>Commercial selling was <t>active</t> <fex name="Time">yesterday</fex> but a lack of interest allowed the market to push sharply higher into the mid-session.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Manner
FE.definition:
<def-root>Any description of the <fen>Activity</fen> which is not covered by more specific FEs, including epistemic modification (<ment>probably</ment>, <ment>presumably</ment>, <ment>mysteriously</ment>), and general descriptions comparing events (<ment>the same way</ment>). It may indicate salient characteristics of an <fen>Agent</fen> that affect the action (<ment>presumptuously</ment>, <ment>deliberately</ment>).
<ex>The Government was <fex name="Manner">deliberately</fex> <t>inactive</t> in respect of Maori. language teacher training and teaching.</ex>
</def-root>

FE.name: Agent
FE.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Agent</fen> engages in an ongoing <fen>Activity</fen>.
<ex><fex name="Agent">He</fex> <m>was</m> <t>active</t> for six decades as a painter, graphic designer and theorist of art and design.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Salient_entity
FE.definition:
<def-root>An entity acted upon by the <fen>Agent</fen>.
<ex><fex name="sal">As many as 324 companies' stocks</fex> were <t>active</t> across the board.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Role
FE.definition:
<def-root>This FE identifies the role filled by the <fen>Agent</fen> which is saliently associated with an <fen>Activity</fen>.
<ex>Jacques Fuller has been <t>active</t> <fex name="rol">as a sculptor</fex> in Bloemfontein for almost two decades.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Degree
FE.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Degree</fen> to which the <fen>Agent</fen> or <fen>Salient_entity</fen> is active.
<ex>Mick was an <fex name="Degree">extremely</fex> <t>active</t> volunteer for the Air Force IT Day committee.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Event_description
FE.definition: <def-root>In general, this FE is used for phrases that describe the clause of the target as a whole. There are two somewhat distinct subgroups of sentence modifiers that cover this function.</def-root>

FE.name: Frequency
FE.definition: <def-root>This frame element is defined as the number of times an event occurs per some unit of time. A Frequency expression answers the question how often. It is to be distinguished from Iteration, which pertains simply to the number of times an event occurs-Iteration expressions answer the question how many times. </def-root>

FE.name: Depictive
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE describes a participant of the state of affairs introduced by the target as being in some state during the action. The depicted state does not necessarily or usually facilitate or cause the state of affairs reported by the target. </def-root>

FE.name: Circumstances
FE.definition: <def-root>Circumstances describe the state of the world (at a particular time and place) which is specifically independent of the event itself and any of its participants. </def-root>

FE.name: Explanation
FE.definition: <def-root>The Explanation denotes a proposition from which the main clause (headed by the target) logically follows. This often means that the Explanation causes the target's proposition, but not in all cases. </def-root>

FE.name: Iteration
FE.definition: <def-root>The frame element Iteration is used for expressions that indicate the number of times an event or state (of the kind denoted by the target in its clause) has taken place or held.</def-root>

lexUnit.name: active.a
lexUnit.definition: FN: participating vigorously in a particular sphere or activity.

lexUnit.name: inactive.a
lexUnit.definition: FN: not participating vigorously in a particular sphere or activity.
